Html:
HI everyone,

First of all I should say that your component is great. It helped me a lot. But I've found a strange issue in it. Sometimes it returns wrong address, even if address, that I was looking for, exists. For example, searching "Na Okruhu 394/3 142 00 Praha" will return "Na Okruhu 392/7 142 00 Praha", and searched address is a little bit to the right of that result. Is it an issue of your component, or may be it is an issue of api mapy.cz? Thanks
